main event: A civilian reported seeing the ECHO II satellite over Kettering and Dayton, Ohio on September 17, 1965.
interesting points: The satellite was observed moving to the northeast at 48 degrees elevation., The object was visible for approximately 30 minutes., The observer estimated the speed of the object to be between 7 to 8 thousand miles per hour., The object was described as white with no sound., The sighting occurred during daylight under clear conditions.
witness description: A civilian witness reported the sighting.
